```{r}

library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(cowplot)
library(PNWColors)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggtext)
library(here)

here::here()

fig_dir <- here("figs") 
supp_dir <- here("figs", "supp") 

isofunc <- readRDS("data/07_indivFunc/07_out/gg_isofunc.rds")
numphage <- readRDS("data/05_distribGraphs/05_out/janthino_numphage.RDS")

isofunc
numphage 

library(cowplot)

plot_grid(
  numphage, isofunc, ncol = 1,
  rel_heights = c(1.5, 4)
)


ggsave(here(fig_dir, "F5.pdf"), width=16, height=22)
ggsave(here(fig_dir, "F5.png"), width=16, height=22)
```
